meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2345.

td.p: Tim Matheson, an actor from For the Love of My Daughter
Markie Post, an actress from Night Court and Hearts Afire
David Hyde Pierce, an Emmy nominee from Frasier

tr.td: THE 1980s
TV ACTORS & ROLES
TRANSPORTATION
THE BIBLE
CATS & DOGS
END WITH "TIC"
